entry.title: Biden Administration Allowing State Medicaid Funds to Cover Groceries, Nutritional Care
entry.summary: Critics argue that expanding Medicaid to pay for food is unnecessary and redundant, because SNAP already helps low-income Americans buy groceries.

entry.title: House Votes to End CDC Vaccine Requirement for U.S. Visitors
entry.summary: The original order restricted the entry of non-citizens who are not immigrants into the United States by air travel unless they were fully vaccinated against the virus.

entry.title: D.C. Judge Argues 13th Amendment Prohibiting Slavery May Provide Constitutional Right to Abortion
entry.summary: Judge Kollar-Kotelly made the argument while weighing in on a case involving pro-life protesters charged with blocking access to a clinic.

Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Jon Calder, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. entry.title: FDA Proposes Annual Covid Vaccine for Most Americans
entry.summary: FDA officials want to rollout an annual strategy in which an updated strain-specific vaccine is developed in the spring for fall rollout.
